/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++11 -O3  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/icp.dir/icp.cpp.o  -o icp -Wl,-rpath,/home/stevencui/Software/Sophus/build:/usr/local/lib /home/stevencui/Software/Sophus/build/libSophus.so /usr/local/lib/libpangolin.so -lg2o_core -lg2o_stuff -lg2o_types_sba -lg2o_csparse_extension -lcxsparse -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lGLEW -lX11 -lavcodec -lavformat -lavutil -lswscale -lOpenNI -lOpenNI2 -lpng -lz -ljpeg -ltiff
